api_list.name: topScorersBySeasonTotalPoints
api_list.description:
## Return top players by total points in descending order.

_Season is specified in the URL._
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/playerdata/topscorers/total/season/2011/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/playerdata/topscorers/total/season/2011/"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: topAssistsInThePlayoffsBySeasonTotalAssists
api_list.description:
## Return top 20 players by assists (playoffs) in descending order.

_Playoffs season is specified in the URL._

import requests

url = "https://nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/top_assists/playoffs/2022/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: playerSeasonStatsByName
api_list.description: _player name is specified in the url._
api_list.code:

url = "https://nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/playerdata/name/Jayson Tatum"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: playerShotChartDataSeasonPlayoffs
api_list.description:
## Return player shot chart data (season & playoffs)

### Current Players Available:

- LeBron James
- James Harden
- Stephen Curry
    

_Player name and Season are specified in the request URL._

Shot chart is available [here](https://cdn.ssref.net/req/1/images/bbr/nbahalfcourt.png).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/shot_chart_data/Lebron James/2023/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-statistics-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
